content: I am running very late today! Feel free to get started, but I might not be there til 9:15 MT or so
I'm not feeling well this morning, so I'm going to skip this for a bit more rest. Keep an eye out because I might pester y'all about helping out with the ams student conference

Ahh feel better Drew!

Can you remind me, is the broken gallery button in Cookbooks or the resources?
I won't be able to make today's meeting - I have a conflicting obligation. Sorry!!
I set up some things for our Mastodon profile, tweeted out our new fosstodon tag. And am now working on finding some of our old followers over there to follow. Password is the same as for twitter
